str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To wait for, expect. From ek and dechomai; to accept from some source, i.e. to await.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A city, the inhabitants of a city. Probably from the same as polemos, or perhaps from polus; a town.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
From a derivative of tithemi; something put down, i.e. A substruction.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Feminine Singular

str2: A craftsman, artisan, architect, builder. From techne; an artisan; figuratively, a founder.
An artisan, builder, maker; one who labors for the public. From demos and ergon; a worker for the people, i.e. Mechanic.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
